about_the_game:
Bloodland is an online multiplayer combat game, based around magic and spell-casting. Join a team, choose your role, and customize your character's attributes to lead your team to victory. Battle across different landscapes in online matchmaking.

Bloodland is cross-platform enabled and you can access your account from mobile devices as well as PC. This game is a PVP only game, so broadband internet connection is required.

Advance in the game by completing challenges, slaying enemies, and collecting currency drops that can be spent on new gear and aesthetic items. Track your battle statistics and challenge progress in between battles. Join the same battles as friends by browsing active battles.

Bloodland is a solo-developer game being created as a passion project to gain experience in programming and online networking.
detailed_description:
Bloodland is an online multiplayer combat game, based around magic and spell-casting. Join a team, choose your role, and customize your character's attributes to lead your team to victory. Battle across different landscapes in online matchmaking.

Bloodland is cross-platform enabled and you can access your account from mobile devices as well as PC. This game is a PVP only game, so broadband internet connection is required.

Advance in the game by completing challenges, slaying enemies, and collecting currency drops that can be spent on new gear and aesthetic items. Track your battle statistics and challenge progress in between battles. Join the same battles as friends by browsing active battles.

Bloodland is a solo-developer game being created as a passion project to gain experience in programming and online networking.
name: Bloodland

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit/ Windows 8 64 Bit/ Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i5-2300 or AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 560 (1GB) or AMD Radeon HD 7770 (1GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS *: Windows 7 64 Bit/ Windows 8 64 Bit/ Windows 10 64 Bit
  • Processor: Intel Quad Core i7 3770K or AMD Ryzen 5 1600X
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 1060 (3GB)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: Bloodland is an online multiplayer combat game, based around magic and spell-casting. Join a team, play as different roles, and customize your character's attributes lead your team to victory. Battle across different landscapes in online matchmaking.
